mapper.insert: insert into tbl_file (file_path, file_name, file_original_name, file_size, file_content_type) values (#{filePath}, #{fileName}, #{fileOriginalName}, #{fileSize}, #{fileContentType})
mapper.select: select f.id, mpf.member_id, f.file_path, f.file_name, f.file_size, f.created_date, f.updated_date, f.file_original_name, f.file_content_type, m.kakao_profile_url from tbl_member_profile_file mpf join tbl_file f on mpf.id = f.id join tbl_member m on mpf.member_id = m.id where member_id = #{memberId} limit 1

select f.id, cp.counselor_id, f.file_path, f.file_name, f.file_size, f.created_date, f.updated_date, f.file_original_name, f.file_content_type from tbl_counselor_profile_file cp join tbl_file f where counselor_id=#{counselorId} and f.id=cp.id
